title: Events
description: Simple Version of a Tanss Support/Outlook Event

de.description: Eine simple Version eines Tanss Supports/Outlook Events

start.description: The date and Time when the event starts

end.description: The date and Time when the event ends

plannedDuration.description: The duration in Minutes from Start to End of the Event

type.description: State or Type of the Event

location.description: Defines, where a support takes place

durationApproach.description: The duration in Minutes that is added to an Event for the drive to a Customer. Only used if Location is CUSTOMER

owner.description: The Name of the Technician responsible for the event

tanssTicketId.description: The Id of the Tanss Ticket

tanssSupportId.description: The Id of the Tanss Support

outlookEventId.description: The Id of the Outlook Event

tanssCompanyId.description: The Id of the Company in Tanss

tannsEmployeeId.description: The Id of the Employee in Tanss

tannsVacationId.description: The Id of the Vacation in Tanss

tanssIllnessId.description: The Id of the Illness in Tanss

availableSlots.description: Array containing all available TimeSlots for a proposed Event

busyHours.description: Array containing all busy time slots of the owner

bookedTimeslot.description: Timeslot chosen by the customer; must be validated to appear as a valid event

emailAddress.description: The Email Address an Name of an Attendee

ownerFullName.description: The full Name of the Event Owner

companyFullName.description: The full Name of Company the Event is booked on

tenant.description: The tenant slug of the tenant

planningType.description: The PlanningType of the event, is used to differentiate Supprt and Appointment in Tanss

changeKey.description: The Microsoft ChangeKey of a synced Event

recurrence.description: The Recurrence Rule of the Event
